name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of diverse experience in delivering high-performance solutions, specializing in **PHP**, **SQL**, and **APIs** development. Proficient in implementing core principles like **OOP**, **SOLID**, and design patterns to create scalable and maintainable systems. Proven ability to contribute towards **TDD**, **DDD**, and clean architecture practices that improve code quality and team productivity.

Skilled in using an extensive tech stack including **JavaScript** and **HTML/CSS** for frontend integration, alongside experience in version control systems. Strong analytical skills coupled with a proactive attitude enhance my capability to tackle complex challenges while fostering teamwork and collaboration. Committed to continuous learning and sharing knowledge within the team, I bring a sense of humor to my work environment, creating a positive and motivating atmosphere for those around me.
